mapper.select: SELECT videos.vdoId as vdoId, vdoNa, users.userNo as userNo, vdoPath, vdoImg, vdoRemark, likeNum, dislikeNum, watchNum, videos.createTime as createTime, isPublic, userNa, userImg from userislike LEFT JOIN videos LEFT JOIN users ON videos.userNo=users.userNo ON userislike.vdoId = videos.vdoId WHERE userislike.userNo=#{userNo} AND isLike=1

SELECT videos.vdoId as vdoId, vdoNa, users.userNo as userNo, vdoPath, vdoImg, vdoRemark, likeNum, dislikeNum, watchNum, videos.createTime as createTime, isPublic, userNa, userImg from videos LEFT JOIN users ON videos.userNo=users.userNo WHERE vdoRemark like #{searchWords} AND (vdoType=#{vdoType} OR #{vdoType}='')

SELECT videos.vdoId as vdoId, vdoNa, users.userNo as userNo, vdoPath, vdoImg, vdoRemark, likeNum, dislikeNum, watchNum, videos.createTime as createTime, isPublic, userNa, userImg from videos LEFT JOIN users ON videos.userNo=users.userNo
mapper.insert: insert into videos (vdoNa, userNo, vdoPath, vdoImg, vdoType, vdoRemark, likeNum, dislikeNum, commentNum, watchNum, isPublic) values (#{vdoNa}, #{userNo}, #{vdoPath}, #{vdoImg}, #{vdoType}, #{vdoRemark}, #{likeNum}, #{dislikeNum}, #{commentNum}, #{watchNum}, #{isPublic})
mapper.update: UPDATE videos set commentNum = commentNum-1 where vdoId=#{vdoId}
UPDATE videos set commentNum = commentNum+1 where vdoId=#{vdoId}
UPDATE videos set likeNum = likeNum+1 where vdoId=#{vdoId}
UPDATE videos set dislikeNum = dislikeNum+1 where vdoId=#{vdoId}
UPDATE videos set likeNum = likeNum-1 where vdoId=#{vdoId}
UPDATE videos set dislikeNum = dislikeNum-1 where vdoId=#{vdoId}
